episodes.title: Escaping Polygamy's Grip: From FLDS First Wife to Advocate Against Abuse | Charlene's Journey
episodes.description:
Join us as we delve into the extraordinary life of Charlene, a woman who grew up in the complex world of polygamy, ultimately becoming the first wife of FLDS bishop, Lyle Jeffs. Her story is one of resilience, strength, and the pursuit of justice.

Charlene faced unimaginable challenges within her polygamous marriage, enduring persecution for daring to ask questions and challenge the status quo. Ignored by her husband and sent away from her children for seemingly trivial reasons, she found herself in a situation that demanded her to "repent" for hitting the snooze button on her alarm clock.

As she shares her remarkable journey, Charlene opens up about the hardships she endured within the FLDS community and her courageous decision to break free from the confines of polygamy. Today, she advocates against abuse and raises awareness about the dark realities hidden behind closed doors.

Discover the inspiring transformation of a woman who went from being a marginalized figure in a polygamous society to an empowered advocate for change. Learn more about her experiences, insights, and the motivation behind her new book, "Tell Your Heart to Beat Again."

Join us in shedding light on the untold stories of those who break free from oppressive situations, finding strength in adversity. Don't miss this eye-opening interview that explores the depths of human resilience and the power of raising awareness. Subscribe now to be part of this incredible journey of courage and redemption. #EscapePolygamy #SurvivorStories #TellYourHeartToBeatAgain

episodes.title: Growing Up In Polygamy: Elise's Story - Part 1
episodes.description:
Welcome Back!

In this interview we dive deep into the incredible life story of Elise, a courageous woman who grew up in the FLDS (Fundamentalist Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints) community in Northern Utah. Elise's journey is a testament to the power of resilience and the indomitable spirit of the human soul.

Elise's upbringing was far from ordinary. Raised in a polygamous family within the FLDS community, she attended Alta Academy, a private school where Warren Jeffs, a controversial and infamous figure, served as the principal. This institution was not like your typical school, and the FLDS community had its own unique beliefs, practices, and way of life.

Throughout the video, Elise shares her personal experiences and struggles growing up in this tightly-knit, secretive community. She delves into the challenges she faced, the strict rules she had to follow, and the emotional toll it took on her as a young woman
